statements: SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants WHERE submission_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants WHERE submission_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT contact_email, applicant_name FROM grant_applicants WHERE submission_deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants ORDER BY submission_deadline DESC, applicant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, email_address FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM submission_deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, email_address, phone_number FROM grant_applicants WHERE email_address LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT applicant_name, submission_status FROM grant_applicants INNER JOIN submission_deadlines ON grant_applicants.applicant_id = submission_deadlines.applicant_id;
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT applicant_name, email_address FROM grant_applicants WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM submission_deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM submission_deadlines WHERE submission_status IN ('Pending', 'Approved');
SELECT ga.applicant_name, sd.deadline_date FROM grant_applicants ga JOIN submission_deadlines sd ON ga.applicant_id = sd.applicant_id;
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT * FROM grant_contacts WHERE contact_relation = 'Supervisor';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM grant_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, submission_deadline FROM grant_applicants WHERE submission_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_contacts;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM grant_applicants WHERE submission_deadline > '2023-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone, contact_relation FROM grant_contacts WHERE contact_relation = 'Advisor' ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email, submission_date, submission_time FROM grant_applicants JOIN submission_deadlines ON grant_applicants.submission_deadline = submission_deadlines.submission_date;
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM applicant_contacts ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT grant_name, submission_date FROM grants_submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_name, submission_date FROM grant_applicants INNER JOIN grants_submissions ON grant_applicants.applicant_id = grants_submissions.applicant_id;
SELECT * FROM grant_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM grant_applicants ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT G.applicant_name, GC.contact_name FROM grant_applicants G JOIN applicant_contacts GC ON G.applicant_id = GC.applicant_id WHERE G.applicant_id = 1;
SELECT distinct GS.grant_name, GC.contact_email FROM grants_submissions GS JOIN applicant_contacts GC ON GS.applicant_id = GC.applicant_id;
SELECT G.applicant_name, S.submission_date FROM grant_applicants G LEFT JOIN grants_submissions S ON G.applicant_id = S.applicant_id;
SELECT * FROM applicants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM applicants WHERE applicant_id = 'fd073a56-596f-4b38-89fb-fc79cf7a0c6e';
SELECT * FROM submission_deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date, comments FROM reviews WHERE submission_id = 'ed78fce1-2a01-4e59-8925-0eb48647769e';
SELECT application_id, status, decision_date FROM applications WHERE decision_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM applicants;
SELECT * FROM submission_deadlines WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM applicants ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT reviews.review_id, reviewers.first_name, reviewers.last_name, reviews.comments FROM reviews JOIN reviewers ON reviews.reviewer_id = reviewers.reviewer_id;

SELECT applications.application_id, applications.status, submission_deadlines.deadline_date FROM applications JOIN submission_deadlines ON applications.submission_id = submission_deadlines.submission_id WHERE applications.status = 'Approved';
